short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A productivity tool that enhances focus by setting a timer and closing distracting websites when the timer runs out.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your focus with our productivity tool, designed to boost concentration. It sets a timer and automatically closes distracting websites once the timer expires, helping you stay on track and maintain productivity.
